messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR HELEN WHATELY
messages.content: An MP who'll make a difference, A committed local campaigner, Helen brings valuable experience outside politics

messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN KINGSTON AND
messages.content: This election is your chance to change the Government and elect a good local MP to represent your concerns. Helen has already been working hard. As your MP she will be able to do so much more.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Helen has worked to ensure Kingston Hospital is safe from closure.
Passionate about the future generation, backing local schools for local children.
Supports our local economy with measures and listening to what local shopkeepers and businesses need.
Fighting for lower fares from local stations has paid off.
Backing police on the beat has resulted in campaigned police patrols.

issues.economy: Supports our local economy with measures and listening to what local shopkeepers and businesses need.
issues.education: Passionate about the future generation, backing local schools for local children.
issues.health: Helen has worked to ensure Kingston Hospital is safe from closure.

contactInformation.address: 3 Bridle Close, Surbiton Road, Kingston Upon Thames, KT1 2JW
